case.title: Register account on store - terms of the website is unchecked

custom.preconds: Environment: Windows 7, 64 bit, Mozilla Firefox 81.0.2 64 bit / Google Chrome Wersja 86.0.4240.111 64 bit / Opera 72.0.3815.148 64 bit
custom.steps: 1. Entering the site 2. Entering the login option 3. Clicking on the option to create an account 4. Entering name in the field "Rafał%%11" 5. Entering last name in the field "Korzeniec@@!!11" 6. Entering e-mail in the field "korzeniec.rafal90@cyberia.pl" 7. Setting the password 8. Date of birth not entered 9. Acceptance of the terms of the website is unchecked 10. Registration confirmation
custom.expected:
Message about the need to mark the acceptance of the terms of the website.
Actual result: Message about the need to mark the acceptance of the terms of the website
Status: passed

Correct working of filtres

case.title: Adding to cart after user login

custom.steps: 1. Entering the site 2. Login of user 3. Entering "Art" 4. Choosing product - Brown Bear - vector Graphics 5. Adding to cart 6. Clocking on continue buying 7. Entering "Clothes" 8. Choosing product - Hummingbird Printed Sweater 9. Adding to cart 10. Execution of buying 11. Displaying items in cart and execution buying 12. Checking personal information 13. Typing adress, 14. Selecting delivery method 15. Selecting payment method 16. Accepting terms 17. Confirmation of buying
custom.expected:
Correct buying process
Actual result: Correct buying process
Status: passed

case.title: Edition of adress in implementation of buying

custom.preconds: Environment: Windows 7, 64 bit, Mozilla Firefox 81.0.2 64 bit / Google Chrome Wersja 86.0.4240.111 64 bit / Opera 72.0.3815.148 64 bit
custom.steps: 1. User in the checkout panel 2. Going through the personal data panel 3. Entering the address panel 4. Clicking edit address 5. Supplementing the company name, NIP, change of address, postal code, telephone number 6. Clicking on edit confirmation 7. Clicking "next" 8. Going through the method of delivery and payment 9. Acceptance of terms 10. Confirmation
custom.expected:
Correct writing of address data.
Actual result: Correct writing of address data. The address editing panel also includes the name and surname, which is more suitable for personal data - so it may be a defect.
Status: passed.

custom.preconds: Environment: Windows 7, 64 bit, Mozilla Firefox 81.0.2 64 bit / Google Chrome Wersja 86.0.4240.111 64 bit / Opera 72.0.3815.148 64 bit
custom.steps: 1. Entering the site 2. Login of user 3. Choosing "Art" 4. Choosing product - Brown Bear - vector Graphics 5. Adding to cart 6. Execution of buying 7. Displaying items in cart and execution buying 8. Checking personal information 9. Typing adress, 10. Selecting delivery method 11. Selecting payment method 12. Accepting terms 13. Confirmation of buying 14. Display information about sent e-mail.
custom.expected:
There should be a confirmation e-mail in your e-mail box.
Actual result: No e-mail from the webstore confirming the purchase.
Status: failed.
